## Welcome

This site collects small analyses and materials around learning English for IT professionals.

### Highlights

- Explore whether respondents have ever paused learning English: [Obstacles](notebooks/obstacles.qmd)

### How to reproduce

You can rebuild the data and pages locally:

```bash
uv run --python 3.12 python -m src.scripts.preprocess
QUARTO_PYTHON=.venv/bin/python quarto render
```
